title: IS_BLANK
description: Returns TRUE if the provided object is blank (empty, null, or contains only whitespace); otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The object to evaluate for a value.

examples:
IF(IS_BLANK(Maint_Amount__c), 0, 1)
-- Returns 0 if Maint_Amount__c is blank, otherwise returns 1.
